title: Recap: Tech falls to #1 Oklahoma - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Recap: Tech falls to #1 Oklahoma - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – No. 1 Oklahoma (36-0, 6-0) completed the series sweep of Texas Tech (19-19, 2-7) with a 21-0 win in game three Sunday afternoon at Rocky Johnson Field.
